result.html: Bíonn lón agam san oifigI have lunch in the office.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn lón agam san oifigI have lunch in the office.

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.html: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam go maiṫ go ḃfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: Whatever my reason for it was...
result.ga: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.orig: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.html: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...
result.ponchtml: Cibé cén t-údar a ḃí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...

result.eng: I will win.
result.ga: Beidh an bua agam
result.orig: Beidh an bua agam
result.html: Beidh an bua agamI will win.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an bua agamI will win.

result.eng: I love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ga: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.orig: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.html: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ponchtml: Tá grá agam do ḋroiċid aċ níorḃ é seo fáṫ mo ċuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.

result.eng: I love places like this.
result.ga: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seo
result.orig: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seo
result.html: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seoI love places like this.
result.ponchtml: Tá dúil ṁór agam in áiteanna mar seoI love places like this.

result.eng: I obviously have a large imagination.
result.ga: Tá samhlaíocht láidir agam mar is léir
result.orig: Tá samhlaíocht láidir agam mar is léir
result.html: Tá samhlaíocht láidir agam mar is léirI obviously have a large imagination.
result.ponchtml: Tá saṁlaíoċt láidir agam mar is léirI obviously have a large imagination.

result.eng: I had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ga: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.orig: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.html: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dom mo ḃróga mo ċrios agus gaċ píosa miotal a ḃaint díom maille le pé leaċtanna agus taois a ḃí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.

result.eng: I still have the room's keyring.
result.ga: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agam
result.orig: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agam
result.html: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agamI still have the room's keyring.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáinne eoċraċ an tseomra fós agamI still have the room's keyring.

result.eng: I have no idea what happened.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.html: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharlaI have no idea what happened.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam beo cad a ṫarlaI have no idea what happened.

result.eng: What else can I do?
result.ga: Goidé an neart atá agam air
result.orig: Goidé an neart atá agam air
result.html: Goidé an neart atá agam airWhat else can I do?
result.ponchtml: Goidé an neart atá agam airWhat else can I do?

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.html: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thúI don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam goidé a ḋéanfainn aċ go bé ṫúI don't know what I'd do without you.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: Don't cry! Be patient! {to self}
result.ga: Ná bím ag caoineadh Bíodh foighid agam
result.orig: Ná bím ag caoineadh Bíodh foighid agam
result.html: Ná bím ag caoineadh Bíodh foighid agamDon't cry! Be patient! {to self}
result.ponchtml: Ná bím ag caoineaḋ Bíoḋ foiġid agamDon't cry! Be patient! {to self}

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.html: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad agam air i mo ċroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
